0: The id of this Stage instance
1: The guild id of the associated Stage channel
2: The id of the associated Stage channel
3: The topic of the Stage instance (1-120 characters)
4: The privacy level of the Stage instance
5: Whether or not Stage Discovery is disabled (deprecated)
6: The id of the scheduled event for this Stage instance

0: The Stage instance is visible publicly. (deprecated)
1: The Stage instance is visible to only guild members.

2: The privacy level of the Stage instance (default GUILD_ONLY)
3: Notify @everyone that a Stage instance has started
